DMTI_STYLE_BADGE: Badge: Show a badge on the home icon.
DTMI_STYLE_ICON: Icon: Show just an icon below the home icon.
DMTI_STYLE_BOTH: Both: Show both an icon and text.
DMTI_PICKER_BGCOLOR_NOTE: The background color of the badge indicator.
DTMI_SWITCH_HIDE_WHEN_VIEWED_NOTE: Prevents the indicator from showing if the current channel with typing users is open.
DTMI_SWITCH_IGNORE_BLOCKED_NOTE: Don't show indicator for users who are blocked.
DTMI_SWITCH_IGNORE_NON_FRIEND_NOTE: Don't show indicator for users who you are not friends with.
DTMI_SLIDER_MAX_USERS_NOTE: The maximum amount of users to display on the tooltip.
